languages.text: "И вдобавок еще "царство убийц"? Я знаю, что вы ничего не смыслите в искусстве убивать, но устраивать орден в подобной клоаке..." {n}В отличие от Ирлиэт, Маражай даже не пытается скрыть ядовитый сарказм в голосе.{/n}

"And 'the kingdom of killers' as well? I know that your kind knows nothing about the art of killing, but to found an order in a waste-coated hole like this?" {n}Unlike Yrliet, Marazhai does not even try to hide the venomous sarcasm in his voice.{/n}
languages.original_text: "И вдобавок еще "царство убийц"? Я знаю, что вы ничего не смыслите в искусстве убивать, но устраивать орден в подобной клоаке..." {n}В отличие от Ирлиэт, Маражай даже не пытается скрыть ядовитый сарказм в голосе.{/n}

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And 'the kingdom of killers' as well? I know that your kind knows nothing about the art of killing, but to found an order in a waste-coated hole like this?" {n}Unlike Yrliet, Marazhai does not even try to hide the venomous sarcasm in his voice.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Et le "royaume des assassins", également ? Je sais que votre peuple maîtrise bien mal l'art du meurtre, mais fonder un ordre dans une décharge pareille ? » {n}Contrairement à Yrliet, Marazhai n'essaie même pas de cacher le sarcasme dans sa voix.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And 'the kingdom of killers' as well? I know that your kind knows nothing about the art of killing, but to found an order in a waste-coated hole like this?" {n}Unlike Yrliet, Marazhai does not even try to hide the venomous sarcasm in his voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Et le "royaume des assassins", également ? Je sais que votre peuple maîtrise bien mal l'art du meurtre, mais fonder un ordre dans une décharge pareille ? » {n}Contrairement à Yrliet, Marazhai n'essaie même pas de cacher le sarcasme dans sa voix.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「それから、『殺人者の王国』ってか？お前が殺しの技術について無知なのは知っているが、こんな廃棄物だらけの穴の中で秩序を築こうとでもいうのか？」{n}ユリエットと違って、マラズハイは声に毒のある皮肉を隠そうともしない。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And 'the kingdom of killers' as well? I know that your kind knows nothing about the art of killing, but to found an order in a waste-coated hole like this?" {n}Unlike Yrliet, Marazhai does not even try to hide the venomous sarcasm in his voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「それから、『殺人者の王国』ってか？お前が殺しの技術について無知なのは知っているが、こんな廃棄物だらけの穴の中で秩序を築こうとでもいうのか？」{n}ユリエットと違って、マラズハイは声に毒のある皮肉を隠そうともしない。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “你管这叫‘杀人犯的王国’？我早就知道你们猴子对杀戮的艺术一无所知，可你们居然在这种满地垃圾的破洞里搞了个什么组织？”{n}玛拉斋与伊莉耶特不同，他甚至完全没有隐藏声音中恶毒的讽刺意味。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And 'the kingdom of killers' as well? I know that your kind knows nothing about the art of killing, but to found an order in a waste-coated hole like this?" {n}Unlike Yrliet, Marazhai does not even try to hide the venomous sarcasm in his voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你管这叫‘杀人犯的王国’？我早就知道你们猴子对杀戮的艺术一无所知，可你们居然在这种满地垃圾的破洞里搞了个什么组织？”{n}玛拉斋与伊莉耶特不同，他甚至完全没有隐藏声音中恶毒的讽刺意味。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Und auch das 'Königreich der Mörder'? Ich weiß, Euresgleichen versteht nichts von der Kunst des Mordens, doch in einem abfallverseuchten Drecksloch wie diesem einen Orden zu gründen?" {n}Anders als Yrliet macht Marazhai sich nicht einmal die Mühe, den giftigen Sarkasmus in seiner Stimme zu verhehlen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And 'the kingdom of killers' as well? I know that your kind knows nothing about the art of killing, but to found an order in a waste-coated hole like this?" {n}Unlike Yrliet, Marazhai does not even try to hide the venomous sarcasm in his voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Und auch das 'Königreich der Mörder'? Ich weiß, Euresgleichen versteht nichts von der Kunst des Mordens, doch in einem abfallverseuchten Drecksloch wie diesem einen Orden zu gründen?" {n}Anders als Yrliet macht Marazhai sich nicht einmal die Mühe, den giftigen Sarkasmus in seiner Stimme zu verhehlen.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «¿Y el "reino de los asesinos" también? Ya sé que tu pueblo no entiende el arte de matar, pero ¿habéis fundado una orden en semejante estercolero?». {n}A diferencia de Yrliet, Marazhai ni siquiera intenta ocultar su venenoso desdén.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And 'the kingdom of killers' as well? I know that your kind knows nothing about the art of killing, but to found an order in a waste-coated hole like this?" {n}Unlike Yrliet, Marazhai does not even try to hide the venomous sarcasm in his voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Y el "reino de los asesinos" también? Ya sé que tu pueblo no entiende el arte de matar, pero ¿habéis fundado una orden en semejante estercolero?». {n}A diferencia de Yrliet, Marazhai ni siquiera intenta ocultar su venenoso desdén.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Ya 'katiller krallığı'na ne demeli? Hani tamam, öldürme sanatından zerre anlamadığınız zaten belli de... Böyle bir lağım çukurunda örgütlenmek de neyin nesi?" {n}Yrliet'in aksine Marazhai, sesindeki alaycılığı gizlemeye tenezzül etmiyor bile.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And 'the kingdom of killers' as well? I know that your kind knows nothing about the art of killing, but to found an order in a waste-coated hole like this?" {n}Unlike Yrliet, Marazhai does not even try to hide the venomous sarcasm in his voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ya "katiller krallığı"na ne demeli? Hani tamam, öldürme sanatından zerre anlamadığınız zaten belli de... Böyle bir lağım çukurunda örgütlenmek de neyin nesi?" {n}Yrliet'in aksine Marazhai, sesindeki alaycılığı gizlemeye bile tenezzül etmiyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
